nickname = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update user_student set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nickname = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phoneNumber = #{phonenumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Community_id = #{communityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, classes = #{classes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, portrait = #{portrait,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, passwd = #{passwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where Stu_id = #{stuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:

FROM user_student WHERE name = #{name} And passwd = #{passwd}
